import React from 'react'; import { CDBSidebar, CDBSidebarContent, CDBSidebarFooter, CDBSidebarHeader, CDBSidebarMenu, CDBSidebarMenuItem, } from 'cdbreact'; import { NavLink, BrowserRouter as Router } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Switch } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Route } from 'react-router-dom'; import Projects from './componentes/Projects'; import Beginning from './componentes/Beggining'; import AboutMe from './componentes/AboutMe'; import Skills from './componentes/Skills'; import ContactMe from './componentes/ContactMe'; const Sidebar = () => { return
}> Lautaro Beginning About Me Projects Skills Contact Me
Sidebar Footer
}; export default Sidebar;
